subject: Luggage
British Open (Golf)
Sporting Goods and Equipment
Golf
Airlines and Airplanes
Airports
lead_paragraph: For golfers, whose success is predicated on acting only after a careful consideration of the odds, there is no greater leap of faith than entrusting their golf bags to a network of strangers.
